com.madrobot.graphics.bitmap

Class PackedBitmap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madrobot.graphics.bitmap.PackedBitmap

  • public class PackedBitmap
extends Object

    An image that is compressed to occupy very little memory.

    This image allows very images with low color counts to occupy as little as one byte per pixel.
    Warning!: Drawing operation of a PackedImage is slower than a regular Image
    Regular Image Packed Image
    The efficiency of alpha processing and rgb data extraction is platform dependent

                int width,

        Packs the source rgba image and returns null if it fails
        Parameters:
        rgb - array containing ARGB data
        width - width of the image in the rgb array
        height - height of the image
        Returns:
        a packed image or null

      • toByteArray

        public byte[] toByteArray()
        This method allows us to store a package image into a persistant stream easily thus allowing us to store the image in RMS.
        Returns:
        a byte array that can be loaded using the load method
